ygData.subject: Re: Clarifications on 'Twisting'  Bug or feature?  Read on.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks for the clarification J.M. Seeing as this is the case, do you know if there s any hope from Verant to make it less of a constant twitch motion? For
ygData.messageBody:
> BARDS WERE DESIGNED WITH 'TWISTING' IN MIND. THIS IS NOT AN EXPLOIT, THIS
> IS A DESIGN FEATURE.

> Mr. Schafer, you are quite possibly doing yourself a great disservice by not
> cycling songs at your level.
>
> Cycling Hymn is rather pointless at that level range, but there are so many
> more options for you, and they continue to grow. As I stated in a post last
> week, a bard that doesn't cycle is like a warrior who refuses to wear plate
> and use 2h weapons, or a wizard that refuses to memorize spells, a ranger
> that doesn't track, a paladin that doesn't lay hands, etc.

Thanks for the clarification J.M. Seeing as this is the case, do you know
if there's any hope from Verant to make it less of a constant twitch
motion? For example, by making it so you can have an instrument slot (like
a ranged slot), where you switch between weapons and instrument without
popping things between slots? Of course, you'd still have to do some
inventory switching to change weapons.

Thanks,
